article_title: Sam Youngman: Rand Paul's strange and winding path to 2016
article_text: The past week, capped off with a fascinating appearance on This Week With George Stephanopoulous, was a bad one for U.S. Rand Paul of Kentucky and fully demonstrated the path he is taking to the 2016 Republican nomination: One step forward, two steps back and all on a tightrope.

article_metadata.title: Sam Youngman: Rand Paul's strange and winding path to 2016 | Lexington Herald-Leader
